Text: Roll of Lehman Forwards Cc On we rolled the forwards maturing on to On we amended the forwards so that they now mature on Also we entered into puts maturing on Lehman is sending me a spreadsheet with the details and Lehman Brothers in Geneva should send us the confirms shortly Jeff Nogid Enron Global Finance

Forward Terms Cc Nogid Enron Global Finance Forwarded by Jeff NogidHOUECT on AM Fleming Matthew AM To cc Kakar Rahul S Subject Forward Terms Jeff As discussed yesterday please find attached the final numbers for the forward rolls as well as the put options The only thing to note is that as Enron pays dividends the forward prices will be adjusted downward accordingly ENE Forward Rollxls Please call if there are any questions Regards Matt Matt Fleming Corporate Equity Derivatives Lehman Brothers Inc Phone Fax This message is intended only for the personal and confidential use of the designated recipients named above If you are not the intended recipient of this message you are hereby notified that any review dissemination distribution or copying of this message is strictly prohibited This communication is for information purposes only and should not be regarded as an offer to sell or as a solicitation of an offer to buy any financial product an official confirmation of any transaction Re Jeff I only have emails from you or forwarded by you re Lehman Cc spoke to Raul Cacar at Lehman Bros He thought that wed get the confirms and the ISDA tomorrow or Monday Jeff Nogid Enron Global Finance

Re ISDA Master Agreement between Enron Corp Enron and Lehman Bros Finance SA LehmanIm back from vacation give me a call Clint is out today so that I can catch up Have you heard anything from Lehman Bros about this Thanks Jeff Nogid Enron Global Finance

ENE equity swap for Nogid Enron Global Finance Forwarded by Jeff NogidHOUECT on PM PM To cc Subject ENE equity swap for Jeff Details of todays trade are as follows Trade Date April Maturity October Number of Shares Initial Price Notional LIBOR resets in mo Spread Div Rebate for this period All in Rate Next payment date July As we discussed equity and interest will be settled on the July reset date and at maturity Please call me if you have any questions Regards Christine Visit our website at This message contains confidential information and is intended only for the individual named If you are not the named addressee you should not disseminate distribute or copy this email Please notify the sender immediately by email if you have received this email by mistake and delete this email from your system Email transmission cannot be guaranteed to be secure or errorfree as information could be intercepted corrupted lost destroyed arrive late or incomplete or contain viruses The sender therefore does not accept liability for any errors or omissions in the contents of this message which arise as a result of email transmission If verification is required please request a hardcopy version This message is provided for informational purposes and should not be construed as a solicitation or offer to buy or sell any securities or related financial instruments

Roll of Bear Stearns Equity Forward Cc Today we rolled the maturing equity trade with Bear Stearns Here are the details Shares New Fwd price Maturity Date Aug Settlement Aug Jeff Nogid Manager Enron Global Finance

FW Roll of Bear Stearns Equity Forward Cc Here are the details of the Bears Stearns Equity Forward roll We have not amended the trigger price Jeff Original Message From Nogid Jeff Sent Wednesday May PM To Ross Steve Cc Freeland Clint Shackleton Sara Subject Roll of Bear Stearns Equity Forward Steve Today we rolled the maturing equity trade with Bear Stearns Here are the details Shares New Fwd price Maturity Date Aug Settlement Aug Jeff Nogid Manager Enron Global Finance

Comparison of Equity Forward Terms UBS CSFBI read the UBS CSFB confirmations to find any material differences that would give one party preferential treatment over the other and came up with the following differences Settlement Notice CSFB days UBS days Most Favored Nations Clause UBS has this incorporated in confirm CSFB no mention of clause SaraI would appreciate it if you can do a quick review of the confirms in a case I left something out Jeff Nogid Manager Enron Global Finance

Total Return Term SheetForwarded by Jeff NogidHOUECT on PM From David J Vitrella PM To Jeff Nogid Tim Despain cc John Greene Jeff Kinneman Subject Total Return Term Sheet Forwarded by David J VitrellaHOUECT on PM Rosica Paul on PM To cc Subject Total Return Term Sheet David Please find attached a copy of the term sheet as discussed Please give me a call to discuss further Best Regards Paul SwapENEdoc Paul S Rosica Lehman Brothers Phone Fax This message is intended only for the personal and confidential use of the designated recipients named above If you are not the intended recipient of this message you are hereby notified that any review dissemination distribution or copying of this message is strictly prohibited This communication is for information purposes only and should not be regarded as an offer to sell or as a solicitation of an offer to buy any financial product an official confirmation of any transaction or as an official statement of Lehman Brothers Inc its subsidiaries or affiliates Email transmission cannot be guaranteed to be secure or errorfree Therefore we do not represent that this information is complete or accurate and it should not be relied upon as such All information is subject to change without notice SwapENEdoc

SWAP TermsForwarded by Jeff NogidHOUECT on PM Barna Peter Equity Capital Markets on PM To cc Maanavi Dariush CICGGEDNY Subject SWAP Terms ENETRRSwapAdoc Jeff and David Attached is a draft term sheet for the Total Return Swap discussed Please give us a call after you have reviewed We would very much like to work with you on this transaction so please let us know if you have any questions or comments and we will address them in a timely manner Thank you ENETRRSwapAdoc

FW Forward ConfirmHere is a copy of a trade confirm Can you spot any problems Jeff Forwarded by Jeff NogidHOUECT on AM Haratunian Stephen on PM To cc Subject FW Forward Confirm Jeff as we discussed attached is the confirm for the forward Original Message From Haratunian Stephen Sent Thursday May PM To Subject Forward Confirm Tim attached for your review is the confirm of the equity forward Please feel free to call me with any questions or comments ECT Forward Confirmdoc This message is for the named persons use only It may contain confidential proprietary or legally privileged information No confidentiality or privilege is waived or lost by any mistransmission If you receive this message in error please immediately delete it and all copies of it from your system destroy any hard copies of it and notify the sender You must not directly or indirectly use disclose distribute print or copy any part of this message if you are not the intended recipient CREDIT SUISSE GROUP and each of its subsidiaries each reserve the right to monitor all email communications through its networks Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender except where the message states otherwise and the sender is authorised to state them to be the views of any such entity ECT Forward Confirmdoc

Revised Term Sheet Cc Here is a new conformation The terms check to the deal ticket Jeff How are the other confirms progressing Bear has called again for their confirmations Forwarded by Jeff NogidHOUECT on AM Aneela Charania AM To Jo CT Jeff CT Clint nron cc Subject Revised Term Sheet Forwarded by Aneela CharaniaHOUECT on AM From David J Vitrella AM To Aneela CT cc Subject Revised Term Sheet Throw the first one out Forwarded by David J VitrellaHOUECT on AM Simon Jon on PM To David Vitrella Enron John Greene Enron Selena Reyes Enron cc Subject Revised Term Sheet With apologiesGot the payment dates wrong This has the correct information Sorry for the confusion Regards Jon SwapJundoc Jon Simon Equity Derivatives CREDIT First SUISSE Boston Phone Phone Fax Email This message is for the named persons use only It may contain confidential proprietary or legally privileged information No confidentiality or privilege is waived or lost by any mistransmission If you receive this message in error please immediately delete it and all copies of it from your system destroy any hard copies of it and notify the sender You must not directly or indirectly use disclose distribute print or copy any part of this message if you are not the intended recipient CREDIT SUISSE GROUP and each of its subsidiaries each reserve the right to monitor all email communications through its networks Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender except where the message states otherwise and the sender is authorised to state them to be the views of any such entity Unless otherwise stated any pricing information given in this message is indicative only is subject to change and does not constitute an offer to deal at any price quoted Any reference to the terms of executed transactions should be treated as preliminary only and subject to our formal written confirmation SwapJundoc

SWAP Terms Cc Forwarded by Jeff NogidHOUECT on PM Laurel Adams AM To Jeff CT Jo CT Jill CT cc Subject SWAP Terms Who in Corporate Legal would be the correct person to initial this document Or would it be the Corp trader Jeff you may be able to sign off your agreement with the termsIm not sure that they are looking for a legally authorized signatory but as I have no idea what Corp intended to trade Im thinking you dont want me signing it Please advise ASAP Forwarded by Laurel AdamsHOUECT on AM Enron North America Corp From Selena Reyes AM To Laurel CT cc Subject SWAP Terms Laurel Attached is a term sheet from Merrill Lynch on ENE stock that we traded yesterday in swap on behalf of Corp ML is requesting that someone sign the term sheet Can you forward this to legal and find out who would be the right person to sign the term sheet I think it may be of an urgent matter bc we are trading with them today Keep me posted Thanks Selena Forwarded by Selena ReyesHOUECT on AM Barna Peter Equity Capital Markets on PM To cc Maanavi Dariush CICGGEDNY Lyons Maureen CICGGELPNY Subject SWAP Terms ENETRRSwaplegaldoc ENEswapxls John Attached is a termsheet and execution summary for the ENE swap entered into today If we dont get to mm shares by Friday we are happy to tranche the swap based on the number of shares executed at that time Please give me a call if you have any questions or comments We will give you a call in the morning to discuss if you would like us to continue our hedging activity Thank you ENETRRSwaplegaldoc ENEswapxls

Issuer Forward TransactionsHere is a term sheet from another potential counterparty DB is treating any ISDAs with Banker Trust Co as a temporary thing and would like to have new ISDAs negotiated in DBs name J Forwarded by Jeff NogidHOUECT on PM on PM To cc Subject Issuer Forward Transactions Jeff per our conversation today I have attached a basic equity forward confirm note that this is our generic form and will be modified to suit the contract that we enter into I have also attached a document discussing a proprietary way that we have developed to enter into tax deductible forwards I look forward to working with you further with regard to this transaction Best regards Mike Ladas Vice President Strategic Equity Transactions Group p f See attached file Tax Deductible ForwarddocSee attached file Issuer Forward quarterly resets ENEdoc Tax Deductible Forwarddoc Issuer Forward quarterly resets ENEdoc

ENE Forward Termsheet and Forward Confirmation Template Cc Here is a termsheet and sample confirmation for the termination of the Total Return Swaps and the booking of a Forward Purachase contract JEff Forwarded by Jeff NogidHOUECT on PM Lyons Maureen CICG Equity Linked Capital Markets on PM To cc Subject ENE Forward Termsheet and Forward Confirmation Template Hi Jeff Per our conversation this afternoon I have attached the draft forward purchase termsheet and forward transaction confirmation template for your review Please give us a call to discuss terminating the Total Return Swap as of Friday and entering into a forward purchase contract at your earliest convenience If you have any questions or need additional information please let us know We are looking forward to speaking with you soon ENEForwardDraft termsheetdoc ForwardConfirmationTemplatedoc Thank you Maureen Lyons Merrill Lynch Equity Linked Capital Markets T F Maureen Lyons Merrill Lynch Equity Linked Capital Markets T F ENEForwardDraft termsheetdoc ForwardConfirmationTemplatedoc

Copies of ISDA documentsAnnMarie Tiller has asked for A copy of the ISDA Master Agreement with Bear Stearns ISDA Government Bond Option Definitions I dont have copies of the above documents and would be grateful if you can get copies to her Thanks Jeff
Jills Position ReportsHere is one file with the position reports Have a great weekend Jeff

Preliminary confirms Cc I propose the following steps to get through the final hurdle and be able to wrap up this Sisyphusian exercise I would like to have sample Equity Forward contracts amended for our registration language and any other items that you feel should be changed generated for ML CSFB BS you can leave out the trade details You can take their sample confirmations and change them I will then take the confirmations to Ryan Siurek and have him check the settlement language to make sure that they meet the new accounting guidelines We can incorporate Ryans changes and then send the samples to the appropriate Investment Bank for their comments If everything checks out we can then fill in the commercial terms for all the forwards completed to date I thinkthat this would simplify the whole process as we focus on confimation templates and not the many different trades with the various banks Call me to discuss any change to my plan Thanks J

Issuer Forward TransactionsForwarded by Jeff NogidHOUECT on AM on PM To cc Subject Issuer Forward Transactions Jeff per our conversation today I have attached a basic equity forward confirm note that this is our generic form and will be modified to suit the contract that we enter into I have also attached a document discussing a proprietary way that we have developed to enter into tax deductible forwards I look forward to working with you further with regard to this transaction Best regards Mike Ladas Vice President Strategic Equity Transactions Group p f See attached file Tax Deductible ForwarddocSee attached file Issuer Forward quarterly resets ENEdoc Tax Deductible Forwarddoc Issuer Forward quarterly resets ENEdoc

ENE Forward Termsheet and Forward Confirmation TemplateForwarded by Jeff NogidHOUECT on AM Lyons Maureen CICG Equity Linked Capital Markets on PM To cc Subject ENE Forward Termsheet and Forward Confirmation Template Hi Jeff Per our conversation this afternoon I have attached the draft forward purchase termsheet and forward transaction confirmation template for your review Please give us a call to discuss terminating the Total Return Swap as of Friday and entering into a forward purchase contract at your earliest convenience If you have any questions or need additional information please let us know We are looking forward to speaking with you soon ENEForwardDraft termsheetdoc ForwardConfirmationTemplatedoc Thank you Maureen Lyons Merrill Lynch Equity Linked Capital Markets T F Maureen Lyons Merrill Lynch Equity Linked Capital Markets T F ENEForwardDraft termsheetdoc ForwardConfirmationTemplatedoc
ML DetailsStart Date Aug Dates are rough the deal is for year Maturity Date Aug Shares Price

Forward Draft NY Enron Corporationcame in this morning the long awaited Bear Stearns forward I havent looked at it but will take a look at it shortly after I update some slide for the Finance Committee J Forwarded by Jeff NogidHOUECT on AM Snyder Frank Exchange on PM To cc Froom Ilene Exchange Subject Forward Draft NY Enron Corporation Jeff The Forward Draft that you have been expecting is attached for your review Registration rights language reflecting the most current EITF ruling will be available in the near term and when ready will be forward to you for review as well At least you can begin reviewing the Draft of the proposed confirmation We will look forward to hearing your comments at your earliest convenience NY Enron Corp Forwarddoc Have a pleasant weekend Frank Snyder Derivatives Documentation email phone fax NY Enron Corp Forwarddoc Bear Stearns is not responsible for any recommendation solicitation offer or agreement or any information about any transaction customer account or account activity contained in this communication
Jills Position ReportNogid Enron Global Finance

Its sad but trueNogid Enron Global Finance To see below Subject no subject BEFORE and AFTER MARRIAGE Before You take my breath away After I feel like Im suffocating Before Twice a night After Twice a month Before She loves the way I take control of a Situation After She called me a controlling manipulative egomaniac Before Ricky Lucy After Fred Ethel Before Saturday Night Live After Monday Night Football Before He makes me feel like a million dollars After If I had a dime for every stupid thing hes done Before Dont Stop After Dont Start Before The Sound of Music After The Sound of Silence Before Is that all you are eating After Maybe you should just have a salad honey Before Wheel of Fortune After Jeopardy Before Its like living a dream After Its a nightmare Before dozen After stem Before Turbocharged After Needs a jumpstart Before We agree on everything After Doesnt she have a mind of her own Before Victorias Secret After Fruit of the Loom Before Feathers handcuffs After Ball and chain Before Idol After Idle Before Hes lost without me After Why cant he ask for directions Before When together time stands still After This relationship is going nowhere Before Croissant and cappuccino After Bagels and instant coffee Before Oysters After Fishsticks Before I can hardly believe we found each other After How the hell did I end up with someone like you Before Romeo and Juliet After Bill and Hillary
